MissingArgumentsError.title: Missing Arguments
MissingArgumentsError.details: The following required arguments are missing to perform this operation: {{arguments}}
MissingArgumentsError.solution: Try again later or contact Stakekit support

MinimumAmountNotReached.title: Minimum Stake Amount Not Reached
MinimumAmountNotReached.details: Stake amount is less than the minimum required amount: {{amount}}
MinimumAmountNotReached.solution: Try again with an amount equal to or greater than the minimum

YieldUnderMaintenanceError.title: Yield Under Maintenance
YieldUnderMaintenanceError.solution: Transfer more funds to your account or contact Stakekit support

InsufficientFundsError.title: Insufficient Funds
InsufficientFundsError.details: Your don't have enough balance to perform this operation
InsufficientFundsError.solution: Transfer more funds to your account or contact Stakekit support

BalanceUnavailableError.title: Balance Unavailable
BalanceUnavailableError.solution: Try again later or contact Stakekit support

GasPriceUnavailableError.title: Gas Price Unavailable
GasPriceUnavailableError.details: Gas price information is not currently accessible
GasPriceUnavailableError.solution: Try again later or contact Stakekit support

NotImplementedError.title: Feature Not Implemented
NotImplementedError.details: This feature is not yet implemented

TokenNotFoundError.title: Token Not Found
TokenNotFoundError.details: The specified token could not be located
TokenNotFoundError.solution: Try again later or contact Stakekit support

BroadcastTransactionError.title: Transaction Broadcast Error
BroadcastTransactionError.details: An error occurred while broadcasting the transaction
BroadcastTransactionError.solution: Try again later or contact Stakekit support

MissingGasPriceStrategyError.title: Missing Gas Price Strategy

MissingGasPriceStrategyError.solution: Try again later or contact Stakekit support

SubstrateMalformedTransactionHashError.title: Invalid Transaction Hash
SubstrateMalformedTransactionHashError.details: The provided Substrate transaction hash is invalid
SubstrateMalformedTransactionHashError.solution: Try again later or contact Stakekit support

SubstratePoolNotFoundError.title: Pool Not Found
SubstratePoolNotFoundError.details: The specified Substrate pool was not found
SubstratePoolNotFoundError.solution: Try again later or contact Stakekit support

SubstrateBondedAmountTooLowError.title: Bonded Amount Too Low
SubstrateBondedAmountTooLowError.details: The bonded amount is insufficient for this operation
SubstrateBondedAmountTooLowError.solution: Try again later or contact Stakekit support

TronMissingResourceTypeArgumentError.title: Missing Resource Type
TronMissingResourceTypeArgumentError.details: A resource type argument is missing in the Tron request

AaveV3TokenPairNotFoundError.details: The specified Aave V3 token pair was not found

CosmosAcccountNotFoundError.details: The specified Cosmos account could not be located
